ActJudges Act
Subjectthe Right Hon. Beverley M. McLachlin ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Right Hon. BEVERLEY M. MCLACHLIN, Chief Justice of Canada, effective December 15, 2017.
